response.overview: Starting from May 10, 2010, Shang Chuan, former researcher of the Chinese Academy of Social Sciences and former president of the Chinese Ming History Society, gave a lecture on "Emperor Yongle" in the Lecture Room column. The program has caused a great response. Emperor Yongle Zhu Di is one of the greatest emperors in Chinese history. His great achievements are comparable to those of the Qin Emperor, Han Emperor, Tang Emperor and Song Emperor. Let's see Ming historian Shang Chuan reinterpret the emperor in Chinese history who far surpassed the Han and Tang dynasties, and was praised and criticized. He was the most mysterious, legendary and painful emperor.
response.title: 百家讲坛：永乐大帝
